Params[3]: Look, something is written on the wall.
Following where Liv is pointing at, you find a neatly written slogan on the wall of an abandoned building.
"Earth has been stricken with innumerable disasters, and time has washed every one of them away. Live for tomorrow, because all will pass."
It looks kind of new as well. Could one of the scavengers have written this?
You don't usually see scavengers being so optimistic.
True... Which reminds me, I think I read something similar in that book from before.
You mean that "Cardman Rider Genesis" book? The handwriting does look kind of similar. It might be written by the same person.
But the words below the slogan look like they are written by someone else.
A hazily written "of course" can be seen below the slogan. There seems to be something else after these two words, but they have been roughly scrubbed off.

Params[2]: It really is the owner of the book.
It's not every day you run into optimistic people.

Params[3]: The young man who scrubbed off the words is showing severe symptoms of infection...
Let's just hope that he carried enough serum to treat himself...
